trans-unit.source: Defines a collection that stores <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un insieme contenente oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> con cui inizializzare il nuovo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class from an array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> da una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> con cui inizializzare il nuovo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class from another <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> da un altro oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> da aggiungere all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> with the specified value to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> con il valore specificato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The index into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> at which the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Indice nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente in cui è stato inserito il nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Consente di copiare gli elementi di una matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> nell'insieme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> containing the objects to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> contenente gli oggetti da aggiungere a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to the end of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi di una matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> alla fine di <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del parametro <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> containing the objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> contenente gli oggetti da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> to the end of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> specificato alla fine di <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del parametro <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> da individuare.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> contiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> is contained in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> è contenuto nella raccolta; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the values copied from <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Istanza unidimensionale di <see cref="T:System.Array" /> destinazione dei valori copiati da <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index into <c>array</c> to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: Indice in <c>array</c> verso cui iniziare la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> values in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instance at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia i valori <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente in un’istanza unidimensionale di <see cref="T:System.Array" /> nell’indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="array" /> parameter is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="array" /> è multidimensionale.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> is greater than the available space between <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> and the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi contenuti in <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> è maggiore dello spazio disponibile tra <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> e la fine di <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="array" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del parametro <paramref name="array" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> parameter is less than the <paramref name="array" /> parameter's lower bound.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del parametro <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> è minore del limite inferiore del parametro <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore in grado di scorrere l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of the subelements of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> you can use to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un enumeratore dei sottoelementi di <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> utilizzabile per scorrere la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Builds a hash value based on all values contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Compila un valore hash basato su tutti i valori contenuti nell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: A hash value based on all values contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore hash basato su tutti i valori contenuti nell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> da individuare.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specificato nella classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Indice dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specificato dal parametro <paramref name="value" /> nella classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, se trovato; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero nel quale deve essere inserito il <c>valore</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> nella classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero della voce da individuare nella classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the entry at the specified index of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la voce in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> at the specified index of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: La voce <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="index" /> non è compreso nell'intervallo valido di indici per la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to remove from the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> da rimuovere da <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> from the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specifico da <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not found in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specificato dal parametro <paramref name="value" /> non viene trovato in <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> corrente.
